inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing an elective primary coronary artery bypass graft surgery (CABG)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On pump or off pump CABG surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute myocardial infarction with Creatinine Kinase-MB level > 10% of CK and /or ECG
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other combined aortic valve intervention except cardiac valve or mitral valve surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation or planned participation in another cardiovascular study before study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to give informed consent due to mental condition, mental retardation, or language barrier
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or residual deficits from CVA.
